mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_stats_today ( full_short_url, gid, date, today_uv, today_pv, today_uip, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES( #{fullShortUrl}, #{gid}, #{date}, #{todayUv}, #{todayPv}, #{todayUip}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE today_uv = today_uv + #{todayUv}, today_pv = today_pv + #{todayPv}, today_uip = today_uip + #{todayUip}, update_time = #{updateTime};
